document.full_text: a dispute centers on what to do with the area surrounding its askariya shrine, one of the holiest sites in shiite islam, which is near a warren of old houses where many sunni muslims live.
document.title: samarra journal: rebuilt iraq mosque buoys spirits, but new sectarian splits loom
lines_and_colors: a dispute centers on what to do with the area surrounding its askariya shrine, one of the holiest sites in shiite islam, which is near a warren of old houses where many sunni muslims live.
